This is well made and everyone really liked it.  Definitely a good buy.
Very impressed with the details and quality of the coat. Perfect fit. Well worth it.

The buttons are a cheap plastic and not sewn on good.  Otherwise the coat is good quality, attractive, well made, and versatile.  I used it for a 1970's Beatles costume and as part of a pirate costume. The coat is warm/hot for indoor parties. Many people at parties asked inwhere I got the jacket from. 评论详情: I look good in it, which is great, but quality is very low, for example in 2 days I managed to lose ALL buttons. i.e. they were just teared apart from simple wearing. Also be aware that of all these things on amazon are just dropshippers from aliexpress, you can buy the same jacker there for 40$ with delivery.

Everyone love the garment at the part, and thought I had it made custom just for me!  Ready to wear right after unpacking. Excellent fabrics, lace, lining and padding. Wonderful!  Can’t wait for the next costume party!

I loved this product for a few reasons:  1. First, it came in a good packaging. It was folded properly, and I solid box.  2. I was surprised by the quality of the material and detail. Its standard is much higher than a custom.  3. It’s very comfortable. It has a nice lining that makes it very convenient.
